title: Nothing to Prove - New Season Coming June 1st
description:
Join me this summer for a NEW 12-week season. Each of the 12 weeks of the podcast is based on the 12 chapters in my book Nothing to Prove, so you can listen along and gather your people.  We'll spend time in our Bibles, hear from some incredible guests, and we have some huge surprises for you too.

Upgrade your closet with washable, sustainable, stylish shoes and bags from Rothys.com/madeforthis.

Get your copy of Nothing to Prove here: https://www.amazon.com/Nothing-Prove-Stop-Trying-Hard/dp/1601429614

Pre-Order the Nothing to Prove Bible study here: https://www.amazon.com/Nothing-Prove-Study-Guide-Streaming-ebook/dp/B08ZMF8QFJ
